text:
is there a way to nest modules?

For example, i made a buttons module that holds certain fields . I want to include this in serveral other modules. Yet, if i change the buttons group (either with new styling or fields) it should change in al instances.

```Modules cannot be nested inside of each other. The majority of the time you would want to do this, it is usually for layout reasons. Sections in drag and drop areas, are often the better course of action.```
You can use global content / partials: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/global-content>
Thanks <@UQERM7BLY> ! i saw the documentation, hoped there was a workaround. In this case, global content was not useful. Thanks again!
